name: Football CEO Pro
description:
FootballCEO™ is brought to you by Vi-Ability, the Social Enterprise of the Year 2015. The game gives an insight into the challenges faced by modern day CEOs and how football clubs operate as serious businesses. Proceeds of FootballCEO™ will go towards supporting Vi-Ability initiatives in the community.

Could you transform the fortunes of a non-league football team and propel them towards being a world class organisation? Could you nurture the success on and off the field to attract star signings and bigger corporate sponsorships? Do you have the business and commercial awareness to make it as a top Football CEO?

Now you have the chance to find out!

Football CEO puts you in the hot seat of your club as you simulate the life of a CEO. Whilst juggling your work/ life balance, you can take control of your own football team and realise your ambition of reaching the pinnacle of the football world. By taking responsibility of the operational and commercial functions, you must manage a roster of staff from the programme seller and the kit coordinator to the commercial director, show visionary leadership, deal with the day to day issues faced within a typical football club, and negotiate sponsorship contracts all whilst keeping the fans happy. No easy task!
